BBC “All of us at Curzon are concerned about the future. Change in life is inevitable but if after Brexit the essential EU support we receive is stopped or replaced, then the risks we are able to take with films that exist outside of the mainstream will become much harder and all our lives will be the poorer for it. “
ID: 10513795 11. Kenneth Lonergan while accepting the Original Screenplay award for Manchester By The Sea . View this image ›
BBC “The morning after the presidential election my daughter woke up in tears. She didn’t want to go to school, but my wife insisted that she go. She said “Perhaps there are children in school who are probably frightened and perhaps you can help them.” She went. She turned 15 two weeks ago and she’s been to five demonstrations protests in that time. I’m very, very proud of her.”
